metadata.name: Stream Bai-ee's EditTrax Genesis Collection
metadata.description:
Bai-ee is using the WarpSound music player to provide previews (Radio Edits) of his EditTrax Genesis Collection, streaming at 256k. 

All tracks are available as individual EditTrax Music OBJKTS (NFTS on Tezos) at (https://EditTrax.com). Allowing collectors to rapidly edit the arrangement of each track before downloading as a high-quality .WAV file. Valuable utility to DJs, content creators, and audiophiles. 

An interactive approach to music integrating looper functionality and a download mechanism. Exploring new and imaginative ways to perform, distribute, and consume tracks.

*BIG THANKS to WARPSOUND for providing the interactive music nft framework at (https://warpsound.gitbook.io/). I've customized it to have a click out to EditTrax via the logo and am hosting it myself on Arweave. Trax are being pulled in from IPFS.

Collecting this whitelists you to mint the first Ethereum based EditTrax player and gain access to future drops / gated trax at (https://EditTrax.com)
